title: Ayurvedic herbal formulations Haridra Khanda and Manjisthadi Kwath (brihat) in the management of allergic rhinitis: A pharmacological study
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Rudranil Bhowmik, Md Adil Shaharyar, Mahibub Mahamadsa Kanakal, Arnab Sarkar, Syeda Ayesha Farhana, Shalam M. Hussain, Abdullah Khan, Pallab Mandal, S. Roshan, Achintya Mitra, Sanmoy Karmakar
